content.head1: This site is under severe construction
content.para:
Colors are temporary as well as controls, and stylings

It is a functional test, and is in the process of assinging classes, and creating animated interactions

I am currently using semantic ui, which allows to build controls and grids very easily similar to bootstrap but with other advantages


The point of this portfolio is also to apply and integrate js,html5, json and css
